message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go to $110. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I can meet you at $105, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still trying to save a bit of money. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I can meet you at $107, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $107?
